# NSTextWritingDirection.embedding

**Case**

Text is embedded in text with another writing direction.

## Declaration

```swift
case embedding
```

## Overview

For example, an English quotation in the middle of an Arabic sentence could be marked as being embedded left-to-right text.

## Constants

- **NSTextWritingDirection.override**: Enables character types with inherent directionality to be overridden when required for special cases, such as for part numbers made of mixed English, digits, and Hebrew letters to be written from right to left.
